title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 344.3 - Other requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 344.3 - Other requirements

State Regulations
(a) When an income withholding order for
child support or combined child and spousal support is issued, the court or
other issuer must serve or cause to be served a copy of such income withholding
order, along with any supplemental document required, upon the State
disbursement unit, the employer or income payor, and the parties to the
order. (b) An income withholding
order directing payment to the State disbursement unit pursuant to this Part
shall: (1)
direct the employer or income
payor to remit payments, payable to the State disbursement unit, to the mailing
address designated by the office; (2)
be on the form for income withholding
promulgated by the office for this purpose, which form shall include the
necessary information and directions to ensure the characterization of the
income withholding order as an income withholding notice as described and
required by section 666(b) of chapter
7
of title 42 of the United States Code; and
(3)
specify the amount of
support to be withheld by the debtor's employer or income payor, which must be
sufficient to ensure compliance with the order of support and also must include
an additional amount to be applied to the reduction of arrears, if
any. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18

344.3

Amended

New

York State Register August 17, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 33, eff. 8/17/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
